comments:
Steps to reproduce:
-------------------
1. Start Eclipse from a new workspace.
2. File -> New -> Other -> Test -> Recording -> Http Proxy Recorder. Click Next.
3. Enter a file name and project name (or accept the defaults) and click Finish.
4. When the "Start Recorder" window appears, click on the X on the top right 
corner to close the window.
5. Wait.

After a while (of waiting), you will get a pop-up window saying Start recording 
was aborted due to a NullPointerException.

I've included the contents of the .log file below. All of the exceptions were 
generated by the steps above, as I started from a new workspace.

!SESSION Apr 06, 2004 09:14:49.703 ---------------------------------------------

jitc)

Command-line arguments: -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -install

Changes committed as of 3.0_20040406_1247 build.  Build is currently broken 
due to recent o.e.h.exe.local changes. Will mark as FIXED when build is 
verified.

Fixed.  Also fixed the additional SWT errors in the log file.  Design decision 
for the recording to continue if the progress dialog is closed (information 
still updated in the Recorder Control View).
